products.name: HTTPD
products.description: The Apache HTTP Server, colloquially called Apache, is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

products.name: OpenSSH
products.description: OpenSSH is a suite of secure networking utilities based on the Secure Shell protocol, which provides a secure channel over an unsecured network.

products.name: MySQL
products.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.
